WorkItem.Description:
Hi, i mu st to read thi file excel, this file is created by a server procedure from a big company, i can't read the data inside. How i can do it? there is some special function?
Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Get no value from xls, with no error in xls file

Comments.Message:
Because this file is not an Excel file but a HTML file, as far as I know you can't open these directly with PHPExcel. 
Open it with MS Excel and save it to native XLS or XLSX format. Or you may try to write a simple program that converts from HTML format to CSV.
Agree with cus. We unfortunately can't read HTML files with PHPExcel - unless someone one day creates an HTML reader.
